blog.name: ask-tywinlannister-fanfics
blog.title: Lady of the Rock
blog.description:
Husband Lord Tywin Lannister 🐯 GoT Fanatic 💛 Tywin was King 👑 Requests: OPEN👌
||Hear me Roar||

summary: I See Greatness in You || Tywin Lannister
body:
I See Greatness in You || Tywin Lannister

((AN AU REQUEST WHAAAAT!? Please lemme do well on this!!


You were in collage and of course you were trying your best. You were doing everything you could after working your butt off to get to the top where you were now. But now that you were in college it seemed that everything was completely different. College was in an anything like you thought it was going to be. It was a rather laid-back atmosphere for all your professors and classes. All for except one. In your history class with Mr Lannister things were very much different.


Mr. Lannister you quickly found out was a Man Who Loved to debate with people and to prove that he was right all the time. You don’t understand how you don’t remember when your debate fights began but it seemed that every class, every session, nearly every question that was asked he would call upon you knowing that you found either the history situation different than him or that you would have the answer and he would know it was wrong.


Regardless he always calling on you and the two of you always fought about whatever the question was.


Of course by now the class knew that mr. Lannister love to pick on you and he loved to get you riled up. And also seem that he loved to break you down as he would constantly tell you that you were wrong and he was right and this was how the answer should have went. Everybody knew that he was a know-it-all and nobody was surprised when they found out that he was a rather Rich college professor who got this way by strategies and working with higher up members in society.


Nobody understood as to why he was still a college professor with his riches he was, but here he was teaching and arguing with you.


“[Name], see me after class.”


Mr. Lannister said with his back to the classes he wrote on the Blackboard with his chalk. It felt to you as if everyone’s eyes in the class had turned to you and we’re actually giving you looks of sympathy and worry. You shrunk back into your chair this was the last thing that you needed at the end of the day.


When all the other people have left leaving the two of you alone in the class you Rose from your seat and walk down the steps down toward his desk.


“Yes, Mr. Lannister?”


You questioned. You looked at him and from an up-close perspective and you could actually see just how clean and well-kept together he was. His suit was black and pressed nicely. His hair combed back and his face holding very little stubble. It was a clean stubble, but very little to hold. Then his Bright Eyes. His eyes that were naturally a cold expression seem to not be that at this moment in time.


“Some of the other collage professors are concerned.”


He said causing your brow to arch.


“It seems that some of your schoolmates have been telling them about our little debates. About how flustered you get while having them. Truth be told if it were anyone else I wouldn’t really give a damn. But it’s not.”


You found yourself lost and confused. He spoke to you differently now, unlike every other conversation now, he spoke to you as if you were an actual human and not some crude idiot.


“Do you know the reason why I always call on you first?”


“To see if I’m paying attention?”


Tywin’s lips twitched a tad. He chuckled as he leaned against the front of his desk. His hands helping to support his tall frame.


“I see something great in you that I haven’t seen in anyone in a long time. Children come through here all the time merely sliding by on their daddy’s money. But you. I know how hard you worked to get here – I’ve read your file.”


You felt your cheeks warm. Why he had taken such an interest in you you didn’t know except for what he told you. And it didn’t help that he merely chuckled when he seen your blush.


“I know you’ll be something someday. Change the world and all that. Not because you care, but because you’re a hard worker and goal driven… I see a lot of myself in you when I was your age.”


“Thank you, Mr. Lannister.”


You told him not really knowing what else to say. He chuckled a bit nodding his head and giving you for the first time ever a smile. And then it was then you understood.


He had faith in you where in others he didn’t.

summary: Πωλείται το κάστρο του Game of Thrones
title: Πωλείται το κάστρο του Game of Thrones
body:
Πωλείται το κάστρο του Game of Thrones

Ενώ οι θαυμαστές περιμένουν με ανυπομονησία τον τελευταίο κύκλο του «Game of Thrones», υπάρχει μία είδηση που θα τους χαροποιήσει, μέχρι να επιστρέψει η σειρά στο HBO το 2019. Το κάστρο που γνωρίζουν καλά οι θαυμαστές, καθώς χρησιμοποιήθηκε για σκηνές της δραματικής σειράς φαντασίας πωλείται για λιγότερο από ένα εκατομμύριο δολάρια.

Δυστυχώς, το Westeros δεν είναι ένα πραγματικό μέρος, αλλά το…

View On WordPress

summary: [Spoilers] A question occurred to me on rewatch
title: [Spoilers] A question occurred to me on rewatch
body:
Why didn’t Ned Stark tell Catelyn about Jon’s true parentage? Not trusting her with that secret seems a little strange for someone as honor bound as Ned. I understand that it’s a necessity for the show, as that’s the reason Jon went to the nights watch. It just seems weird to me because it doesn’t fit Ned.



Source: https://ift.tt/2vIgEtJ

summary: Ours is the Fury Chapter 5: Harry the Hare
title: Ours is the Fury Chapter 5: Harry the Hare
